message:
Dear {{ doc.applicant_name }},

Thank you for applying to the {{ doc.designation }} position at {{ doc.custom_company or "our organization" }}.

We wanted to let you know that your application is currently on hold as we continue evaluating all candidates. This does not reflect negatively on your qualifications — we simply need more time to make a final decision.

We appreciate your patience and will reach out to you once we have an update.

Warm regards,
The HR Team
name: Job Applicant On Hold Notification
subject: Your Application for {{ doc.designation }} Is Currently On Hold
